column4: anyone please help me... in fedora, gnome panels remebered their positions automatically .. but not in ubuntu.. :( please help! this is driving me crazy!
anyone please help me... in fedora, gnome panels remebered their positions automatically .. but not in ubuntu.. :( please help! this is driving me crazy!
Why not just move everyting on the botrtom panel to the top, and vice-versa?
Yeah, that's what I am forcing to do everytime I reboot my machine, because it isnt remembering the positions!!!
